Posts.Content: I am on my first lot of chemotherapy for breast cancer and find that I have symptom anxiety , I seem to be worrying all the time . As it is winter I am worried about seeing people as everyone seems to have a cold , Have been told by some people to limit your contacts ewit people and others say don't let chemotherapy get in the way of your life. It's all a bit confusing , also would like advice on how to stay calm .
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy experience and advice as finding it difficult

Posts.Content: Thank you I will try and find the thread for chemotherapy but I am not very computer savvy could you tell me how to find it in case I can't do it .
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy experience and advice as finding it difficult
